mapper.sql: voyDate, voyNo, shipNo, reShipNo, startTime, startPort, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, vipRes, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, voyState, voyMemo
mapper.select: select voyDate, voyNo, t_data_voyage.shipNo, reShipNo, startTime, startPort, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, vipRes, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, voyState, voyMemo, s1.shipName, s2.shipName as reShipName from t_data_voyage inner join t_base_ship s1 on t_data_voyage.shipNo = s1.shipNo inner join t_base_ship s2 on t_data_voyage.reShipNo = s2.shipNo where voyDate between #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_data_voyage (voyDate, voyNo, shipNo, reShipNo, startTime, startPort, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, vipRes, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, voyState, voyMemo) values (#{voyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{voyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reShipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{startPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{voyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{voyMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_data_voyage
shipNo = #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reShipNo = #{reShipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME},
startPort = #{startPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firRes = #{firRes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secRes = #{secRes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vipVisa = #{vipVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vipRes = #{vipRes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firVisa = #{firVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secVisa = #{secVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vipPrice = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firPrice = #{firPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
secPrice = #{secPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
voyState = #{voyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
voyMemo = #{voyMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where voyDate = #{voyDate,jdbcType=DATE} and voyNo = #{voyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_data_voyage set shipNo = #{shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reShipNo = #{reShipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, startPort = #{startPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firRes = #{firRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secRes = #{secRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vipVisa = #{vipVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vipRes = #{vipRes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firVisa = #{firVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secVisa = #{secVisa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vipPrice = #{vipPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firPrice = #{firPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secPrice = #{secPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, voyState = #{voyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, voyMemo = #{voyMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where voyDate = #{voyDate,jdbcType=DATE} and voyNo = #{voyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT t_base_ship.shipNo,voyNo,t_base_ship.shipName from t_data_voyage INNER JOIN t_base_ship on t_data_voyage.shipNo = t_base_ship.shipNo

select voyDate, voyNo, t_data_voyage.shipNo, reShipNo, startTime, startPort, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, vipRes, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, voyState, voyMemo, s1.shipName from t_data_voyage inner join t_base_ship s1 on t_data_voyage.shipNo = s1.shipNo where voyDate = #{voyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_data_voyage(voyDate, voyNo, shipNo, reShipNo, startTime, startPort, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, vipRes, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, voyState, voyMemo) values
( #{voyage.voyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.voyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.shipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.reShipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.startPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.firRes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.secRes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.vipVisa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.vipRes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.firVisa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.secVisa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.vipPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.firPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.secPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.voyState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voyage.voyMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_data_voyage WHERE (voyDate, voyNo) IN
(#{voyage.voyDate}, #{voyage.voyNo})
mapper.select: SELECT voyDate, voyNo, s.shipNo, startTime, s.shipName, startPort, vipRes, firRes, secRes, vipVisa, firVisa, secVisa, vipPrice, firPrice, secPrice, vipSeat, firSeat, secSeat, vipSeat - vipRes- COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN ((t.startSeat = 'VIP座' and t.state IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票')) or (t.returnSeat = 'VIP座' and t.returnState IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票'))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS vipLeft, firSeat - firRes- COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN ((t.startSeat = '一等座' and t.state IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票')) or (t.returnSeat = '一等座' and t.returnState IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票'))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS firLeft, secSeat - secRes- COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN ((t.startSeat = '二等座' and t.state IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票')) or (t.returnSeat = '二等座' and t.returnState IN ('未检票', '改签', '已检票'))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS secLeft FROM t_data_voyage v LEFT JOIN t_base_ship s ON v.shipNo = s.shipNo LEFT JOIN t_data_ticket t ON ((CONCAT(date_format(v.voyDate, '%Y-%c-%d'), ' ', date_format(v.startTime, '%H:%i:%s')) = t.startDate and v.voyNo = t.startVoyNo) or (CONCAT(date_format(v.voyDate, '%Y-%c-%d'), ' ', date_format(v.startTime, '%H:%i:%s')) = t.returnDate and v.voyNo = t.returnVoyNo)) where voyDate BETWEEN #{param2, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and #{param3, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and voyState = 1 and startPort = #{param1, jdbcType = INTEGER} GROUP BY v.voyDate, v.startTime, v.voyNo

select voyNo, s.shipNo, shipName, voyDate, startTime, startPort, vipSeat, firSeat, secSeat, vipRes, firRes, secRes from t_data_voyage v inner join t_base_ship s on v.reShipNo = s.shipNo where voyNo = #{param1, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and voyDate = #{param2, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and startTime = #{param3, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select voyNo, voyDate, reShipNo, shipName, teamNo, travelName, count(*) as teamNum from t_data_voyage v inner join t_base_ship s on v.reShipNo = s.shipNo inner join t_data_ticket t on (v.voyNo = t.startVoyNo and CONCAT(date_format(v.voyDate, '%Y-%c-%d'), ' ', date_format(v.startTime, '%H:%i:%s')) = t.startDate) inner JOIN t_base_travel tr on tr.legalNo = t.legalNo where voyDate between #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY voyNo, voyDate, reShipNo, shipName, teamNo, travelName

select startPort, shipName, travellerType, count(*) as teamNum from t_data_voyage v inner join t_base_ship s on v.reShipNo = s.shipNo inner join t_data_ticket t on (v.voyNo = t.startVoyNo and CONCAT(date_format(v.voyDate, '%Y-%c-%d'), ' ', date_format(v.startTime, '%H:%i:%s')) = t.startDate) inner JOIN t_base_travel tr on tr.legalNo = t.legalNo where voyDate = #{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY startPort, shipName, travellerType

select startPort, shipName, travellerType, count(*) as teamNum from t_data_voyage v inner join t_base_ship s on v.reShipNo = s.shipNo inner join t_data_ticket t on (v.voyNo = t.returnVoyNo and CONCAT(date_format(v.voyDate, '%Y-%c-%d'), ' ', date_format(v.startTime, '%H:%i:%s')) = t.returnDate) inner JOIN t_base_travel tr on tr.legalNo = t.legalNo where voyDate = #{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY startPort, shipName, travellerType
